fields.rule: Roll CRISIS. -1 for every genre after the first in the band.
fields.title: Creative Differences

fields.rule: Ignore all [[CREATIVITY|NEG]] and get +1for each [[CREATIVITY|POS]]  to RECORD rolls.
fields.title: Producer

fields.rule: Pay 1{{MONEY}} per point to improve all RECORD roll for all your bands this year.
fields.title: Company Studio

fields.rule: Roll CRISIS. -1 for every [[POS]][[NEG]] pairing of the same aspect in the band.
fields.title: Personality Clash

fields.rule: Roll CRISIS. -1 for every TOUR played if there is no {{VAGABOND}} in the band.
fields.title: Homesick

fields.rule: Roll CRISIS. -1 for every RECORD played if you have at least one {{VAGABOND}} in the band.
fields.title: Restless

fields.rule: Roll twice and pick the best on all TOURS for the band. {{STRUGGLE}} penalties are reduced by 1.
fields.title: Tour Manager

fields.rule: Ignore all [[CHARISMA|NEG]] and get +1 for each [[CHARISMA|POS]]  to TOUR rolls.
fields.title: Stage Production

fields.interrupt: Roll TROUBLE for a RECORDING band. No {{CRED}} loss if the band has a {{CLOWN}}.
fields.title: Cabin Fever

fields.rule: Play a BUYOUT on a band. Add their [[SAFETY|POS]][[SAFETY|NEG]] balance to the cost and subtract their {{STRUGGLE}}.
fields.title: What did we just sign?

fields.rule: Play a BUYOUT on a band. Add their [[PEACE|POS]][[PEACE|NEG]] balance to the cost and subtract their {{STRUGGLE}}.
fields.title: Divide and Conquer

fields.rule: Play a BUYOUT if you have a band with higher basic earnings than the one you want to buy.
fields.title: Money Talks

fields.rule: Play a BUYOUT if you have a band with higher {{FAME}} than the one you want to buy.
fields.title: Burning Ambition

fields.rule: The band never gains {{STRUGGLE}} for any reason for this year.
fields.title: Loving Fans

fields.rule: The band cannot do anything else for the year and rolls TROUBLE. Also +1 to positive {{CRED}} or -1 to negative {{CRED}} if there is a {{LOUDMOUTH}}.
fields.title: Concerned Parents

fields.interrupt: Roll TROUBLE for a TOURING band. No {{CRED}} loss if the band has a {{CLOWN}}.
fields.title: Road Rage

fields.rule: The band rolls TROUBLE. At the end of the year, they earn -1{{MONEY}} per {{CLOWN}} and {{VAGABOND}}.
fields.title: Party Hard

fields.rule: Double the effect of every [[NEG]] aspects for the year.
fields.title: Sycophants

fields.rule: Take an artist off their own band for the rest of the year. At the end of the year gain half the band's basic earnings; if the band was inactive, they still get half their full earnings.
fields.title: Solo Flight

fields.rule: Gain +1{{CRED}} for every RECORD card played this year (not as GUEST).
fields.title: Release Party

fields.interrupt: Play on a TOURING band. Roll TROUBLE adding [[PEACE|POS]][[PEACE|NEG]] modifiers. +1{{FAME}} but cannot tour or support anymore this year.
fields.title: Riots!

fields.rule: Gain {{CRED}} according to your [[CHARISMA|POS]][[CHARISMA|NEG]] balance. Double effect if you have a {{HEARTTHROB}}.
fields.title: Meet & Greet

fields.rule: Gain {{CRED}} according to your [[PEACE|POS]][[PEACE|NEG]] balance. Double effect if you have a {{LOUDMOUTH}}.
fields.title: Behind the Music

fields.interrupt: If there is a {{HEARTTHROB}}, double the effect of a TOUR but block the headlining band for this year and gain +1{{STRUGGLE}}.
fields.title: Hysteria

fields.rule: Earn {{MONEY}} per point of the lowest beteen {{FAME}} and {{REPERTOIRE}}. The highest if you have a {{MOGUL}}. Lose the same in {{CRED}}.
fields.title: Kiss My Coffers

fields.interrupt: If there is a {{AUTEUR}}, double the effect of a RECORD but block the recording band for this year and gain +1{{STRUGGLE}}.
fields.title: Magnus Opus

fields.interrupt: Play on a RECORDING band. Roll TROUBLE -1 per {{VAGABOND}} and {{CLOWN}} (but remove 1{{STRUGGLE}} for each). Cannot record or guest anymore this year.
fields.title: Wrecking Balls

fields.rule: Gain +1{{CRED}} for every point of difference between {{FAME}} and {{REPERTOIRE}}.
fields.title: Word of Mouth

fields.rule_custom: +1 for each [[SAFETY|NEG]], -1 for each [[SAFETY|POS]] to the RECORD roll. The RECORDING band gains 1{{STRUGGLE}}.
fields.rule_base: RECORD new music or {{INTERRUPT}} GUEST for a recording band.
fields.title: DECADENCE TALES

fields.rule_custom: Each label can send a band as SUPPORT. +1 to TOUR rolls per [[PEACE|NEG]] and {{LOUDMOUTH}}. Best score gains +1{{FAME}} +1{{CRED}}, all other bands +1{{STRUGGLE}}.
fields.rule_base: Go on TOUR or {{INTERRUPT}} SUPPORT a touring band.
fields.title: BATTLE OF THE BANDS

fields.rule_custom: Apply gains/losses in {{FAME}} to {{CRED}} too. Reroll if you have a {{VIRTUOSO}} or a {{AUTEUR}}.
fields.rule_base: Go on TOUR or {{INTERRUPT}} SUPPORT a touring band.
fields.title: THE ORCHESTRA

fields.rule_custom: +1 for each [[PEACE|NEG]], -1 for each [[PEACE|POS]] to the RECORD roll. The RECORDING band gains 1{{STRUGGLE}}.
fields.rule_base: RECORD new music or {{INTERRUPT}} GUEST for a recording band.
fields.title: THE ANGRY ONES

fields.rule_base: RECORD new music or {{INTERRUPT}} GUEST for a recording band.
fields.title: FAN CLUB EP

fields.rule_custom: +1 to the RECORD roll for each {{AUTEUR}} or {{VIRTUOSO}} in the bands involved. Reroll if you have both.
fields.rule_base: RECORD new music or {{INTERRUPT}} GUEST for a recording band.
fields.title: THE EPIC SUITE

fields.rule_custom: Double all [[CHARISMA|POS]] and ignore any [[CHARISMA|NEG]], but roll TROUBLE if you have a {{CLOWN}}.
fields.rule_base: Go on TOUR or {{INTERRUPT}} SUPPORT a touring band.
fields.title: STAGE THEATRICS

fields.rule_custom: -1{{CRED}} if you have a {{HEARTTHROB}} or {{CLOWN}}, but +1 to TOUR rolls for each of them. Reroll if you have both.
fields.rule_base: Go on TOUR or {{INTERRUPT}} SUPPORT a touring band.
fields.title: LIVE BROADCAST

fields.rule_custom: Apply positive gains in {{FAME}} to {{REPERTOIRE}} and {{MONEY}} too.
fields.rule_base: Go on TOUR or {{INTERRUPT}} SUPPORT a touring band.
fields.title: LIVE ALBUM

fields.rule_custom: Choose one of the GENRES in the band. Every label can send one band with that GENRE to play as SUPPORT. (cannot use cards to SUPPORT)
fields.rule_base: Go on TOUR or {{INTERRUPT}} SUPPORT a touring band.
fields.title: FESTIVAL

fields.rule_custom: Can reroll if you have a {{AUTEUR}}.
fields.rule_base: RECORD new music or {{INTERRUPT}} GUEST for a recording band.
fields.title: CONCEPT ALBUM

fields.rule_base: RECORD new music or {{INTERRUPT}} GUEST for a recording band.
fields.title: COVERS

fields.rule_base: Go on TOUR or {{INTERRUPT}} SUPPORT a touring band.
fields.title: BENEFIT

fields.rule_custom: Every band in the tour gains +1 {{CRED}} for each {{VIRTUOSO}} between them.
fields.rule_base: Go on TOUR or {{INTERRUPT}} SUPPORT a touring band.
fields.title: THE JAM

fields.rule_custom: If you have a {{MOGUL}}, gains in {{REPERTOIRE}} are added to {{MONEY}} and {{FAME}} too but are lost in {{CRED}}.
fields.rule_base: RECORD new music or {{INTERRUPT}} GUEST for a recording band.
fields.title: QUICK HIT

fields.rule_custom: Can reroll if you have a {{SENTIMENTAL}}.
fields.rule_base: RECORD new music or {{INTERRUPT}} GUEST for a recording band.
fields.title: POWER BALLADS

fields.rule_custom: Choose one of the GENRES in the band. Every label can send one band with that GENRE to play as GUEST. (cannot use cards to GUEST)
fields.rule_base: RECORD new music or {{INTERRUPT}} GUEST for a recording band.
fields.title: COMPILATION

fields.rule_custom: Gain {{FAME}} instead of {{REPERTOIRE}} from the RECORD roll.
fields.rule_base: RECORD new music or {{INTERRUPT}} GUEST for a recording band.
fields.title: SOUNDTRACK
